subject: Angular
description: Introduction to data binding in Angular, including one-way and two-way data binding.

subject: Angular
description: Learn about built-in directives like *ngIf, *ngFor, and custom directives.

subject: Angular
description: How services work in Angular and how dependency injection helps with reusability.

subject: Angular

subject: Angular
description: Working with template-driven and reactive forms in Angular.

subject: Angular
description: Using the HttpClient module to make API calls and handle responses in Angular.

title: Pipes in Angular
subject: Angular
description: Introduction to built-in pipes and creating custom pipes for transforming data.

title: Angular Lifecycle Hooks
subject: Angular
description: Understanding Angular component lifecycle hooks like ngOnInit, ngOnChanges, etc.

subject: Angular
description: Using RxJS, Observables for handling asynchronous operations in Angular, RxJS Operators, Subjects, Types of Subjects

title: Angular Modules
subject: Angular
description: Working with Angular modules to structure and organize an Angular application.

subject: Angular
description: Unit testing Angular applications with Jasmine and Karma, and using Angular testing utilities.

subject: Angular
description: Optimizing Angular applications for performance and following best practices in coding.

description: Steps to deploy Angular applications to different environments like production, staging, and cloud services.

subject: React
description: Overview of React, its history, and why it is popular in modern web development.

subject: React
description: Understanding JSX, its syntax, and how it integrates HTML and JavaScript.

title: Components and Props
subject: React
description: Learn about React components, how to create functional components, and pass data with props.

subject: React
description: Introduction to React state, managing state in components, and lifecycle methods.

subject: React
description: Handling user input events like clicks, form submissions, and other UI interactions.

subject: React
description: Learn how to manage form data, controlled components, and form validation in React.

title: React Router
subject: React
description: Learn about React Router for handling navigation and routing in single-page applications.

title: State Management with Context API
subject: React
description: Understand the Context API to share state across multiple components without prop drilling.

subject: React
description: Introduction to React hooks like useState, useEffect, and useContext for functional components.

subject: React
description: Learn about optimizing React applications for performance using techniques like memoization, lazy loading, etc.

title: React Testing
subject: React
description: Learn how to test React components using tools like Jest and React Testing Library.

description: Learn how to style React components using CSS, inline styles, styled-components, and CSS Modules.

title: Building and Deploying React Applications
description: Understand how to build, deploy, and optimize a React application for production.

title: Advanced React Patterns
description: Explore advanced patterns such as higher-order components, render props, and custom hooks for scalable applications.

title: Introduction to Redux
description: Learn the basics of Redux, state management, and how it integrates with React applications.

title: Advanced Redux
description: Dive deeper into Redux with middleware, asynchronous actions, and advanced patterns.

title: React and TypeScript
description: Learn how to use TypeScript with React to build type-safe applications.
